contents: @支忽精英: Stochastic process? lol. That's the most basic of all MFEs and kind of old-fashioned Q-quant. Nowadays losers focus on Q-quant, while i'm P-quant, Fixed-income portfolio management, hedge fund strategies, trading derivatives...Mostly important I have dual background in computer science; machine learning, natural language processing, deep learning is now revolutionizing financial world that you 文科生 loser has no idea about. lol
